description:
Conan and Ran are invited by Heiji and Kazuha to Yadori Village in Shizuoka. Densuke, the village mayor, also invited archaeologist Michiki, historian Yasukatsu, author Fumie, and documentary writer Hajime to help unearth Tokugawa`s buried treasure. Long ago, a member of the excavation team died in a cave-in. Before he died, he wrote the word "nue" on a piece of paper. The Nue is a monster from fairy tales, and the village has Nue legends of its own. That night, the group stays in a run-down hotel in the village, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Conan and Heiji`s Nue Legend (Roar Chapter)
Conan to Heiji no Nue Densetsu (Nakigoe Hen)
Conan, Heiji et la légende du Nue (1re partie : Le cri)
أسطورة كونان و هيجي عن وحش النو (صراخ النو)
コナンと平次の鵺伝説 (鳴声編)
